title: Waste bamboo-derived magnetically separable bamboo-activated carbon: from characterization to effective remediation of fluoride (F−) ions from water
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24952-24968
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03752A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yana Bagbi, Pokjum Yomgam, Enuk Libang, Bijoylakshmi Boruah, Jaspreet Kaur, S. Jayanthi, Sanjeev Kumar, Narender K. Dhania
Magnetically separable magnetite-activated bamboo carbon (MABC), was obtained from waste bamboo biomass via pyrolysis of bamboo chunks and the co-precipitation method.
